channel.title: Illustrations on Ura Design
channel.description: Recent content in Illustrations on Ura Design
channel.copyright: Some rights reserved. Unless otherwise noted, content on this page is under a Creative Commons license.

item.title: Stackspin
item.description: We helped Stackspin, previously known as OpenAppStack, build their new brand personality and visual identity conducting user experience research to provide relevant experience to their users.

item.title: CalyxOS
item.description: We provided a new visual style for CalyxOS, concretized into graphics to illustrate their main concepts and new wallpaper images for the Operating System.

item.title: Internews’ ADAPT
item.description: We designed the full visual identity for Internews’ ADAPT, creating a style to graphically represent ADAPT everywhere.

item.title: Internews’ OPTIMA
item.description: We designed the brand and visual identity for OPTIMA, creating a visual language which emphasizes their motive, principles and style.
